The Liyuanhe Coal Mine is an underground coal mine operated by Datong Coal Mining Group Xuangang Coal and Electricity

operators: Datong Coal Mining Group Xuangang Coal and Electricity
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is fully owned by Datong Coal Mining Group, which is a subsidiary of Jinneng Group.
